text: Marthe Mathilde Cnockaert (28 October 1892 â€“ 8 January 1966), later Marthe McKenna, was a Belgian nurse. She spied for the British forces after the First World War. She became a novelist and wrote over a dozen spy novels in addition to her memoirs. == References == Category:1892 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Spies Category:Nurses Category:World War I people Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:Prisoners sentenced to death Category:Belgian novelists Category:People from West Flanders
title: Marthe Cnockaert
